entry.name: pagebeforehide
entry.title: pagebeforehide
entry.desc: Triggered on the "fromPage" we are transitioning away from, before the actual transition animation is kicked off.

longdesc.p: Callbacks for this event will receive a data object as their 2nd arg. This data object has the following properties on it:

ul.li:
nextPage (object)
A jQuery collection object that contains the page DOM element that we are transitioning to.

longdesc.p: Note that this event will not be dispatched during the transition of the first page at application startup since there is no previously active page.
